• Sampling methods:
    • Chapter 11 (Bishop, 2006)
    • Chapters 23, 24 (Murphy, 2012)
    • Recent review paper on Monte Carlo methods by Michael Betancourt.
    • Introduction to Gibbs sampling (Resnik & Hardisty, 2010)
  • Open source software for probabilistic programming:
    • Stan
    • PyMC3
    • Edward
    • Pyro
    • NumPyro
  1. Bishop, C. M. (2006). Pattern recognition and machine learning. springer.
  2. Murphy, K. P. (2012). Machine learning: a probabilistic perspective. MIT press.
  3. Resnik, P., & Hardisty, E. (2010). Gibbs sampling for the uninitiated. MARYLAND UNIV COLLEGE PARK INST FOR ADVANCED COMPUTER STUDIES.
